QUERY.TITLE: Lillehammer Ice_Hockey Finals
QUERY.DESC: What teams played in the ice_hockey finals at the 1994 Olympic games in Lillehammer ?
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents report which teams played in the final ice_hockey game at the 1994 Olympic games in Lillehammer . Documents , which inform as_to which teams won first and second place in this event without mentioning the finals specifically are also relevant .
